sn35.159:1.1: “Rūpe, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha, rūpāniccatañca yathābhūtaṃ samanupassatha.
sn35.159:1.2: Rūpe, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yoniso manasikaronto, rūpāniccatañca yathābhūtaṃ samanupassanto rūpesupi nibbindati.
sn35.159:1.10: dhamme, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha, dhammāniccatañca yathābhūtaṃ samanupassatha.
sn35.159:1.11: Dhamme, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yoniso manasikaronto, dhammāniccatañca yathābhūtaṃ samanupassanto dhammesupi nibbindati.
